column5: I got some emails on what is and how does a chum funnel work. While ice fishing today I made a video as such. I posted it on you tube but couldn't figure out how to capture it in this post ,so here's the url  <iframe width="480" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/INW5kZONZxI" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Embedded the clip for you. Pretty slick. Thanks for posting.
how is the funnel attached to the line?
